message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,800 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,100? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10,900. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think this is the best I can do.
